item.title: Makes total sense for the audiophile and anyone interested in that "high fidelity feeling"...snobs, true believers, and posers all win today!
item.description:
Makes total sense for the audiophile and anyone interested in that "high fidelity feeling"...snobs, true believers, and posers all win today!

The Galaxy Note 7 is the best no-compromise, big-screen phone you can buy if price is no object. All but the most devoted stylus lovers, however, will do just as well with the cheaper S7 models.

item.title: This is a great view to the future for audio distribution channels...Echo, Amazon, Sonos. Who will have the data necessary to target audio ads or sponsorships, native integrations, etc? Seems like a win for the "device" vs . the original content curator or distributor.
item.description:
This is a great view to the future for audio distribution channels...Echo, Amazon, Sonos. Who will have the data necessary to target audio ads or sponsorships, native integrations, etc? Seems like a win for the "device" vs . the original content curator or distributor.

Several months ago, Sonos revealed plans to bring voice control to its popular home audio speakers. Today at an event in New York City, the company shared more on its approach to letting users play music by speaking commands aloud instead of controlling everything by thumbing through the Sonos app.

item.title: There is just SO MUCH IN HERE...brands and music, Alcohol and music consumers, live events, appropriately aged audience willing to try new things, established alcohol brands trying to break out of the old patterns....it goes on. Really great insights into the power of these relationships. The stewards here could easily be the content aggregators new and old. Radio, streaming, podcasting. It's all there if we want to do the work.
item.description:
There is just SO MUCH IN HERE...brands and music, Alcohol and music consumers, live events, appropriately aged audience willing to try new things, established alcohol brands trying to break out of the old patterns....it goes on. Really great insights into the power of these relationships. The stewards here could easily be the content aggregators new and old. Radio, streaming, podcasting. It's all there if we want to do the work.

More and more artists and record labels are partnering with alcohol brands to strengthen each other's cultural influence.

item.title: How long before Artists and Labels wants something similar? Who decides? What does that look like? Can't be too far off now that it's out there.
item.description:
How long before Artists and Labels wants something similar? Who decides? What does that look like? Can't be too far off now that it's out there.

Hey, have you heard about video? You might have missed it, what with literally every social media platform all but begging you to post more and watch more at all times, but video is the new hotness. And to get individuals to post more video to their platform, Twitter's willing to split the ad take.

item.title: Shark Jump or statement of "arrival" for a medium? - The new WKRP in Cincinatti, 2016 style.
item.description:
Shark Jump or statement of "arrival" for a medium? - The new WKRP in Cincinatti, 2016 style.

The network has committed to a "put pilot" based on Gimlet Media's podcast StartUp, according to a Deadline report. (A "put pilot" refers to the network agreeing to air the pilot or it will be penalized.) Braff, known for his work on Scrubs and the film Garden State, will star in and direct the pilot.

item.title: RHA brings the missing link between high end/high quality headphones and the music going through them...this is a big deal for those who care about fidelity and "perfect sound" in their experience.
item.description:
RHA brings the missing link between high end/high quality headphones and the music going through them...this is a big deal for those who care about fidelity and "perfect sound" in their experience.

​IFA 2016 kicks off tomorrow but Scottish headphone manufacturer RHA couldn't wait to announce its new collection of high-end audio gear that includes its first-ever headphone amp and two new in-ear monitors.

item.title: New York's Bryant Park is tracking visitor behavior
item.description:
New York's Bryant Park is tracking visitor behavior

This is a great insight into the real application of “location targeting” and “localized data analytics” - small footprint, big impact at scale - E

item.title: "Will play for food", Amazons rumored music streaming service could hurt Apple, Spotify, and every musician you love.
item.description:
"Will play for food", Amazons rumored music streaming service could hurt Apple, Spotify, and every musician you love.

item.title: EU Could Make YouTube, Other Music Sites Pay Up to Artists
item.description:
EU Could Make YouTube, Other Music Sites Pay Up to Artists

No shocker here but it does continue to show that business models based on music online have to make some hard choices...this is Europe based reporting but the U.S. Market is in the same boat.
